name: Aimtec - Dark Theme
description: A re-colored, dark theme for forum.aimtec.io. Your eyes will thank you :^)
css: @-moz-document domain("forum.aimtec.io"){body { background:#2f313f;color:#fff}.aimtec--logo{background:url(https://s.put.re/3eqNjTb.png) top center no-repeat}.ipsNavBar_primary,.ipsTabs,.ipsType_sectionTitle,.ipsWidget.ipsWidget_vertical .ipsWidget_title,.ipsItemStatus.ipsItemStatus_large{background:#191a1f !important;border-style:solid;border-width:0px 0px 1px 0px;border-color:#090a0c}#ipsLayout_contentWrapper{background:#22232b}.ipsBox:not(.ipsBox_transparent):not(.ipsModerated){border-width:0px 0px 0px 0px;border-style:solid;border-color:#307dff}.cPost.ipsModerated,.cPost.ipsModerated .cAuthorPane{background:#39282e}.ipsBox.ipsModerated{border-color:#000}article.ipsBox:not(.ipsBox_transparent):not(.ipsModerated){box-shadow:0px 0px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)}article.ipsBox:not(.ipsBox_transparent){box-shadow:0px 0px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)}.ipsSideMenu_title{text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:bold;margin:0 0 5px 0;padding-bottom:5px;color:#fff}.ipsBreadcrumb > ul > li{display:inline-block;line-height:1;font-size:13px;font-weight:400;max-width:500px;height:15px;white-space:nowrap;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;vertical-align:bottom;color:#fff}hr.ipsHr{margin:15px 0;height:0;padding:0;border-width:1px 0 0 0;border-style:solid;border-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.6)}.cAuthorPane_photo .ipsUserPhoto{background:#000;vertical-align:middle;display:inline-block;line-height:1px;position:relative;margin:1px;border-radius:2px;padding:1px;border:1px solid #000;background:#000;box-shadow:0px 0px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)}.ipsButtonBar{line-height:1;background:#354f73}.ipsQuote_citation{background:#090a0c;color:#fff}.ipsQuote{margin:0;padding:0px 15px;border-width:1px 1px 1px 1px;border-color:#000;border-style:solid;position:relative;background:#2f313f;clear:both}.ipsComment{margin-bottom:50px}.ipsBox:not(.ipsBox_transparent):not(.ipsModerated){background-color:#191a1f}aside.ipsComment_author.cAuthorPane.ipsColumn.ipsColumn_medium{background:#191a1f;border-right:1px solid #090a0c}.cPost .ipsComment_meta{margin-bottom:10px;padding:15px 10px 10px 15px;background:#191a1f;border-bottom:1px solid #090a0c}.ipsAreaBackground_light{background:#191a1f}.cke_wysiwyg_frame,.cke_wysiwyg_div{background-color:#191a1f}.cke_ltr .cke_button__source_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -936px !important}.cke_button__bold_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -0px !important}.cke_button__italic_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -24px !important}.cke_button__underline_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -120px !important}.cke_button__ipsemoticon_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -456px !important}.cke_button__ipslink_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -504px !important}.cke_ltr .cke_button__ipspreview_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -624px !important}.cke_top{white-space:normal;background:#191a1f}.cke_button_label{padding-left:3px;margin-top:12px;line-height:17px;vertical-align:middle;float:left;cursor:default;color:#fff;text-shadow:0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.5)}.ipsAreaBackground_reset{background:#191a1f}.ipsDataList.ipsDataList_zebra .ipsDataItem:nth-child(2n):not(.ipsDataItem_selected):not(.ipsModerated):not(.ipsDataItem_new):not(.ipsDataItem_success):not(.ipsDataItem_warning):not(.ipsDataItem_error):not(.ipsDataItem_info):not(.ipsDataItem_status){background:#191a1f}.ipsType_richText{word-wrap:break-word;overflow-wrap:break-word;line-height:1.5;color:#ffffff}.ipsLayout_sidebarright .ipsDataItem:nth-child(2n),#chatcontent .chat_row:nth-child(2n+1){background:#191a1f}.ipsDataItem{width:100%;position:relative;border-width:0 0 1px 0;border-style:solid;border-color:#090a0c}#chatcontent .chat_row{background:#191a1f}#cbInput_container #elSearch{background-color:#090a0c}#elSearch{background:#090a0c;margin-top:6px}.ipsApp textarea{color:#000}#cbCopyright{display:none}#elSearchFilter #elSearchFilter:hover{background:#090a0c}#elSearch #elSearchFilter:hover{font-size:11px;color:#307dff;opacity:1;max-width:110px;white-space:nowrap;text-overflow:ellipsis;overflow:hidden;padding:0 10px;text-align:center;position:absolute;top:0px;line-height:26px;background:#090a0c;width:110px}#elSearch #elSearchFilter{font-size:11px;color:#307dff;opacity:1;max-width:110px;white-space:nowrap;text-overflow:ellipsis;overflow:hidden;padding:0 10px;text-align:center;position:absolute;top:0px;line-height:26px;background:#090a0c;width:110px}.ipsOnlineStatus_offline{color:#3b3b3b}.ipsModerated{background:#39282e;color:#ffcddd}.ipsModerated a{color:#ffcddd}.ipsAreaBackground.ipsPad_half.ipsClearfix.announcement{background:#354f73;border:1px solid #090a0c;color:#fff}a{color:#307dff}a:hover{color:#7cadff}.ipsQuote .ipsQuote_citation a{color:#307dff;text-decoration:none}.cbox333{text-align:center;margin:15px 0;font-size:14px !important;background:#354f73 !important;color:#fff;padding:15px;margin-bottom:20px}.rank_member{color:#c3cfe4}.ipsAreaBackground{background:#191a1f}.ipsLikeRep{background:#090a0c;padding:3px;line-height:16px;display:inline-block;position:relative;margin-top:10px;margin-right:8px}.ipsReputation_count{background:#fff;display:inline-block;position:relative;font-size:13px;font-weight:bold;border-radius:3px;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1)}.ipsMenu{background:#090a0c;box-shadow:0px 7px 20px rgba(48, 125, 255, 0.2);border:1px solid #090a0c;border-radius:3px;z-index:10000;position:absolute}.ipsHovercard{background:#090a0c;box-shadow:0px 7px 20px rgba(48, 125, 255, 0.2);border:1px solid #090a0c}.ipsLikeRep{background:#090a0c !important;padding:3px;line-height:16px;display:inline-block;position:relative;margin-top:10px;margin-right:8px}.ipsMenu_sep{border-top:1px solid #000;margin:4px}.ipsMenu_item > a,.ipsMenu_item > span{display:block;padding:8px 15px;color:#307dff;white-space:nowrap;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis}.ipsReputation_count{background:#22232b;display:inline-block;position:relative;font-size:13px;font-weight:bold;border-radius:3px;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1)}.ipsBreadcrumb [data-action="defaultStream"],.ipsBreadcrumb [data-action="markSiteRead"],.ipsBreadcrumb > ul > li > a{color:#307dff}.ipsNavBar_primary.ipsNavBar_noSubBars > ul > li.ipsNavBar_active > a{background:#354f73}.ipsNavBar_primary > ul > li.ipsNavBar_active > a{color:#fff}a#elNavigation_8{background:#2f313f;border-bottom:0;color:#fff}.ipsNavBar_primary.ipsNavBar_noSubBars{padding-bottom:5px}.ipsComposeArea_dummy{background:#090a0c;color:#fff}.ipsComposeArea_editor{background:#090a0c;position:relative;padding:1px;border-collapse:collapse}.ipsDataList_readStatus .ipsDataItem:not(.ipsDataItem_unread):not(.ipsDataItem_selected):not(.ipsModerated){background:#191a1f}.ipsMenu_headerBar{border-bottom:1px solid #000;border-radius:3px 3px 0px 0px;background:#191a1f}.ipsMenu_footerBar{border-radius:3px 3px 0px 0px;background:#191a1f;border-top:1px solid #000}.ipsType_sectionHead{font-size:20px;color:#fff;line-height:24px;font-weight:400;display:inline-block;margin:0}.ipsMenu.ipsMenu_bottomCenter::before{border-color:transparent transparent #191a1f transparent;left:50%;margin-left:-16px;margin-top:-1px;bottom:100%}html[dir="ltr"] .ipsComposeArea_withPhoto .ipsComposeArea_editor::before{right:100%;border-color:transparent #090a0c transparent transparent}#elProfileActivityOverview .ipsStreamItem,#elUserContent .ipsStreamItem,#elSingleStatusUpdate .ipsStreamItem{box-shadow:none;border:0;margin:0;padding:20px 0;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.6)}.ipsType_pageTitle{font-size:26px;font-weight:400;line-height:1.2;color:#fff}.cke_ltr .cke_button__undo_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -1032px !important}.cke_ltr .cke_button__redo_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -984px !important}.cke_button__strike_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -48px !important}.cke_button__ipsquote_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -648px !important}.cke_button__ipscode_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -432px !important}.cke_ltr .cke_button__bulletedlist_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -816px !important}.cke_ltr .cke_button__numberedlist_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -864px !important}.cke_button__justifyleft_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -744px !important}.cke_button__justifycenter_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -720px !important}.cke_button__justifyright_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -768px !important}.cke_button__removeformat_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -888px !important}.cke_button__textcolor_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -312px !important}.cke_button__bgcolor_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -288px !important}.cke_button__subscript_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -72px !important}.cke_button__superscript_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -96px !important}.cke_button__ipspage_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -552px !important}.cke_button__ipsspoiler_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -672px !important}.cke_ltr .cke_button__indent_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -360px !important}.cke_ltr .cke_button__outdent_icon{background:url(https://s.put.re/px75joD.png) no-repeat 0 -408px !important}a.cke_button_on{background:#307dff}a.cke_combo_button,.cke_combo_on a.cke_combo_button:hover{cursor:default;display:inline-block;float:left;margin:5px;border:1px solid #090a0c;border-bottom-color:#090a0c;border-radius:3px;box-shadow:0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.5),0 0 2px rgba(0,0,0,.15) inset,0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.15) inset;background:#2f313f;background-image:linear-gradient(to bottom,#2f313f,#191a1f)}.cke_reset_all,.cke_reset_all *,.cke_reset_all a,.cke_reset_all textarea{color:#fff}.cke_combo_on a.cke_combo_button{border:1px solid #090a0c;box-shadow:0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.5),0 0 2px rgba(0,0,0,.15) inset,0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.15) inset;background:#4a4e68;background-image:linear-gradient(to bottom,#2f313f,#4a4e68)}.ipsApp .ipsButton_light{background:#090a0c;border-color:rgba(0,0,0,1);color:#fff}.ipsType_light{color:#fff}.ipsApp .ipsButton_primary{background:#307dff;color:#ffffff}.ipsMenu_title{background:#18191e;padding:7px 10px;margin:5px;font-size:12px;font-weight:bold}.ipsDialog > div{display:block;width:90%;max-width:1200px;background:#191a1f;margin:3% auto 0 auto;box-shadow:0px 5px 55px rgba(0,0,0,0.4);position:relative}.CodeMirror{position:relative;overflow:hidden;background:#2f313f;color:#fff !important}.CodeMirror{border-width:1px;border-style:solid;border-color:#000 #000 #000 #000;border-radius:3px;cursor:text}.ipsApp textarea{color:#fff !important}.ipsCode{background:#2f313f;padding:15px !important;border:1px !important;border-color:#000;border-left:4px solid #000 !important;clear:both;direction:ltr;word-wrap:normal}.pln{color:#fff}.ipsApp input[type="text"]{background-color:#090a0c;border-color:#000 #000 #000 #000}.ipsDialog_title{color:#fff;font-size:26px;font-weight:300;text-align:left;line-height:1.2;white-space:nowrap;text-overflow:ellipsis;overflow:hidden;margin:0;padding:12px 15px 0 15px}.ipsApp input[type="number"]{background-color:#090a0c;border-width:1px;border-style:solid;border-color:#000 #000 #000 #000;border-radius:3px;width:100%;max-width:350px;padding:7px}a[data-mentionid]{display:inline-block;border-radius:2px;padding:0px 5px;font-size:90%;color:#fff;text-decoration:none !important;background:#307dff}.ipsWidget.ipsWidget_horizontal .ipsTabs_panel{background:#191a1f;margin:0}hr{color:#090a0c;border-bottom-width:0px;border-top-width:1px;border-bottom-style:solid}iframe[data-embedContent]{width:100%;min-height:165px;margin:10px 0;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,1);position:relative;background-color:#2f313f;background-image:url( "https://forum.aimtec.io/uploads/set_resources_6/cf5a1e7fc191338071d07df134b620d0_large_loading@2x.gif" );background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:center center;background-size:40px 40px}.ipsEmbedded_headerArea{background:#090a0c;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,1);padding:10px;line-height:1;font-size:16px}.ipsEmbedded_content{padding:9px 7px 7px;background-color:#2f313f;min-height:75px}.ipsSelectTree{min-height:32px;border:1px solid #000;width:100%;max-width:350px;border-radius:3px;padding:7px 25px 5px 7px;position:relative;background:#090a0c;margin-bottom:5px}.ipsSelectTree_nodes [data-role="nodeList"]{background:#191a1f;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,1);max-height:300px;overflow:auto}.ipsSelectTree_nodes{position:absolute;top:100%;margin:-4px 0 0 -1px;max-width:500px;border:1px solid #000;border-top:0;border-bottom-right-radius:3px;border-bottom-left-radius:3px;padding:7px;background:#2f313f}.ipsMenu.ipsMenu_bottomCenter::before{border-color:transparent transparent #090a0c transparent;left:50%;margin-left:-16px;margin-top:-1px;bottom:100%}.ipsSpoiler,.ipsStyle_spoiler{margin:0;padding:0px 15px;border-width:1px 1px 1px 1px;border-color:#000;border-style:solid;position:relative;background:#2f313f;clear:both}.ipsSpoiler_header{background:#090a0c;margin:0px -15px;padding:5px 15px;color:#fff;font-weight:bold;font-size:13px;display:block;cursor:pointer}}
